alert.note: Alert for Craighead; Greene (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 24 at 9:35PM CDT until May 24 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN GREENE AND CENTRAL CRAIGHEAD COUNTIES... At 935 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jonesboro, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Paragould, Bono, Bay, Brookland, Crowleys Ridge State Park, Lake Frierson State Park, Walcott, Fontaine, Hergett, Apt, Schug, Gum Point, Farrville, Dorothy, Light, Bethel, Lanieve, Finch and Lorado. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
